verses.verse: At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6458>Hew<s%> you <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like to the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H5927>come<s%> up to me into the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> you an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H6086>wood.<s%>

And I will <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that were in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7665>brake,<s%> and you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And I <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6458>hewed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like to the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up into the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> having the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3871>tables,<s%> according to the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4385>writing,<s%> the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to me.

And I <S%H6437>turned<s%> myself and <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H6213>made;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they be, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from <S%H881>Beeroth<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3292>Jaakan<s%> to <S%H4149>Mosera:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he was <S%H6912>buried;<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> ministered in the <S%H3547>priest's<s%> office in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>
From <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> to <S%H1412>Gudgodah;<s%> and from <S%H1412>Gudgodah<s%> to <S%H3193>Jotbath,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5158>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to him, and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> in his <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers;<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> according as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%> him.

And I <S%H5975>stayed<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> according to the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to me at that <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> you.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> take your <S%H4550>journey<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to them.

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> does the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7592>require<s%> of you, but to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H157>love<s%> him, and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul,<s%>

To <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> for your <S%H2896>good?<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> also, with <S%H3605>all<s%> that therein is.

<S%H7535>Only<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had a <S%H2836>delight<s%> in your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> them, and he <S%H977>chose<s%> their <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, even you above <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H4135>Circumcise<s%> therefore the <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> stiff <S%H7185>necked.<s%> <S%H6203><s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H113>Lord<s%> of <S%H113>lords,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> a <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and a <S%H3372>terrible,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5375>regards<s%> not <S%H6440>persons,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H7810>reward:<s%>

He does <S%H6213>execute<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and <S%H490>widow,<s%> and <S%H157>loves<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> in <S%H5414>giving<s%> him <S%H3899>food<s%> and <S%H8071>raiment.<s%>
<S%H157>Love<s%> you therefore the <S%H1616>stranger:<s%> for you were <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
You shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> him shall you <S%H5647>serve,<s%> and to him shall you <S%H1692>hold,<s%> and <S%H7650>swear<s%> by his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

He is your <S%H8416>praise,<s%> and he is your <S%H430>God,<s%> that has <S%H6213>done<s%> for you <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> things, <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen.<s%>

Your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with three <S%H7657>score<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5315>persons;<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7760>made<s%> you as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>
